roleset.name: selection of a small portion of a larger whole

role.descr: source of the samples (if in addition to arg1)

roles.note: Arg2 added based on corpus examples. Be very careful here-- the line between eventive and physically concrete examples can be fuzzy and hard to see sometime, but try to avoid non-eventive instances!

example.name: light verb
example.text: We took a sample of the total population.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on sample-v.01. No corresponding VNcls.

example.text: Uh their urine sample is going to come out positive because there will be strong metabolytes /.
example.note: Here, they are referring to the actual test procedure, which is an event, rather than an actual physical speciman, which would not be eventive. This distinction can be ambiguous, but do your best!
